item.title: Gateway Shuttle for Thanksgiving Break
item.description: RPI’s Department of Parking and Transportation will again offer Gateway shuttle service to the Albany International Airport, Albany Bus Terminal, and Amtrak Train Station for Thanksgiving break. Shuttles depart from the RPI Student Union horseshoe. To reserve a seat, email hosgob@rpi.edu or call 518-276-6616 by Wednesday, November 19.
item.author: Students

item.title: Dining Halls Point of Sale System Upgrade Coming Soon
item.description: Rensselaer Dining will soon be implementing an update to our POS (point of sale) systems across all dining halls. This enhancement will improve our ability to identify meal plan holders during entry by displaying the RPI ID photo for cashiers, resulting in a faster transaction process.

item.title: MMS Collaboration Software Training Series: Webex Event Training
item.description: Planning a virtual event or supporting a student webinar? Join us for a practical walkthrough of Webex Events as part of the MMS Collaboration Software Training Series. Register now for this webinar presented via Webex on Thursday November 13, 2025 from 11am-12pm: https://rensselaer.webex.com/weblink/register/r4f44a1f130dd0f14e0e8989c146e99b3 Learn how to: - Schedule and brand your event - Use polls, Q&A, and chat tools - Access recordings and reports - Host with confidence

item.title: DotCIO - reminder Microsoft has ended support for Windows 10
item.description: Microsoft Windows 10 support ended on October 14th, 2025. At this time Windows 10 systems are no longer eligible for support including important security patches. Without appropriate mitigation, Windows 10 systems are non-compliant with multiple RPI security policies. Please click in for additional information.
item.author: Community

item.title: Winter Weather Shuttle Information
item.description: As the season for inclement weather approaches, please be advised that shuttle operations may be impacted by adverse conditions. To ensure the safety of both drivers and passengers, service modifications—including alternate routing, service delays, temporary suspension, or full cancellation—may be implemented as necessary.
item.author: Community

item.title: Participants Needed: Immersive Audiovisual Study at CRAIVE-Lab
item.description: Monday, November 10, 2025 12:00 AM - Wed , November 26, 2025 12:00 AM - RPI researchers are recruiting participants (18+ years old, normal hearing) for an immersive study at CRAIVE-Lab. You’ll experience five museum rooms at human scale with spatial audio and then answer a brief questionnaire. Sessions run November 10 — Nov 26; scheduling is flexible. Sign up with Milena Jonas Bem at jonasm@rpi.edu.
item.author: Community

item.title: GrantForward Webinar | Nov. 20
item.description: Date: Thursday, November 20, 2025 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM - The Office of the Vice President for Research will host a 1-hour webinar with GrantForward, the funding search and recommendation service to which we are currently subscribed. All faculty, staff, and students have access to GrantForward. The webinar is a great introduction for new users or a refresher for existing users. Please register at the link above.
